Understate: The claim may understate the eligibility requirements for free concert tickets, as it does not mention that customers must have purchased tickets between October 1999 and February 2013 to be eligible.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the statement that "many Ticketmaster customers are eligible for free concert tickets."
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that all Ticketmaster customers are eligible for free concert tickets, without considering any potential limitations or exclusions.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not mention any alternative explanations or reasons for why customers may be eligible for free concert tickets, leaving room for alternative interpretations or possibilities.
